header.text: 【🧠例句可以先看中文，尝试开口用英文表达后点开🧠前的黑色三角形🔍查看英文表达】

phrases.englishExplanation: 英文释义：促进血液循环

exampleSentences.chinese: 早上跑步能促进血液流动，让我一整天都精神更好。
exampleSentences.english: A quick jog in the morning gets my blood flow going and helps me feel more fresh throughout the day.

relatedExpressions: Get your heart rate up提高心率
Get the adrenaline flowing肾上腺素飙升

exampleSentences.chinese: 如果你不断重复同样的锻炼动作，肌肉会适应，进步就不会太大。
exampleSentences.english: If you do the same exercise over and over, your muscles will get used to it, and you won't see much progress.
